author: serv-inc
description: Most YouTube Videos have keywords. If they are allowed, all is fine. Else, blocks with a page displaying the keywords.
name: ytf

preferences.name: allowKWRegex
preferences.title: Regular Expression for Allowed Keywords
preferences.description: If this regex matches the page's keywords, they are allowed regardless of blocked keywords.

preferences.name: allowEmptyKW
preferences.title: Allow Videos without Keywords
preferences.description: There are some pages without keywords. Allow these?

preferences.name: blockKWRegex
preferences.title: Regular Expression for Blocked Keywords
preferences.description: Block these keywords if allowed keywords do not occur. The default behavior (.*) is a whitelist, where all pages are blocked if they do not contain the allowed keywords. Change this regex to only block certain keywords.

title: YouTube-Filter
@++: lint, README.org version, git commit, upload
